name: Jira + Intercom integration
description: Small barebone app that works as an API for Jira integration with Intercom

JIRA_HOSTNAME.description: Hostname of your JIRA, e.g: domain.atlassian.net

JIRA_BASICAUTH.description: Base64 version of your JIRA username and password (username:password)

INTERCOM_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access token for API usage on your Intercom account
